name: Chrono Cleavers
description:
Experience the thrill of wreaking havoc as a displaced honorable gentleman. 

Try out the demo in the browser. (Windows and IOS version coming soon) Story:

The year is 1876, and you step into the shoes of Sir Edmund Blackwood, trapped in an alternate timeline where different beings from the past and future coexist. Hiding  in the cellars beneath the Tower of London, he must fend off waves of people affected by a mysterious chrono-disease caused by the event that created this alternate reality.

 Armed with a collection of weapons from different time periods, your goal is to survive as long as possible and take down as many of the diseased creatures as you can in the process. Will you emerge victorious or fall in noble combat? Play now and find out, as you unravel the truth behind this strange world, one kill at a time.

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Aim and shoot
  • Space - Dash
  • Esc - Settings
